categories: Category:Star Wars: Episode VII The Force Awakens actors
Category:Star Wars: Episode VIII The Last Jedi actors

nodes.text: Liang Yang is a Chinese stunt performer and actor, best known for portraying FN-2199 in Star Wars: The Force Awakens. He also helped coordinate the film's fight sequences. Additionally, he acted as one of the Elite Praetorian Guards in The Last Jedi.

Outside of the Star Wars universe, Yang has performed stunt work for other notable titles, including Skyfall, where he also made an appearance as a bodyguard, and Game of Thrones, where he served as Pedro Pascal's (Oberyn Martell) stunt double. He won Outstanding Action Performance by a Stunt Ensemble in a Motion Picture for the former and Outstanding Action Performance by a Stunt Ensemble in a Comedy or Drama Series for the latter at the Screen Actors Guild Awards in 2013 and 2015, respectively.
